articles.title: Conformational ensembles of the human intrinsically disordered proteome - Nature.com
articles.description: A computational model generates conformational ensembles of 28,058 intrinsically disordered proteins and regions (IDRs) in the human proteome and sheds light on the relationship between sequence, conformational properties and functions of IDRs.

articles.title: Forget lung, breast or prostate cancer: why tumour naming needs to change - Nature.com
articles.description: The conventional way of classifying metastatic cancers according to their organ of origin is denying people access to drugs that could help them.
